overview:
I am a public relations expert with more than 18 years of experience in PR, sales, business development and marketing and more than 8 years of experience running an independent agency.

I have a solid track record for developing high growth ventures in the technology, consulting and telecom industries. In my role at Emerging Media I work with clients to formulate communications strategy and oversee the implementation of that strategy, making sure we meet our targeted goals.

In the past I have led business development efforts for various companies and have built strategic relationships with key software vendors, top-tier IT consultants and strategic partners across the US.
